title: Authorization Client Services
description: HiveOT runtime service for services setting permissions

oneOf.title: No role
oneOf.description: No role means that the user has no permissions.
comments: It can not do anything until the role is upgraded to viewer or better

oneOf.title: Administrator role
oneOf.description: Administrators can publish and subscribe to any sources and invoke all services

oneOf.title: Device agent role
oneOf.description: Device agents can publish thing events and subscribe to device actions

oneOf.title: Manager role
oneOf.description: Managers can subscribe to Thing TD, events, publish actions and update configuration

oneOf.title: Operator role
oneOf.description: Operators can subscribe to events and publish actions

oneOf.title: Service role
oneOf.description: Services act as an admin user and a device

oneOf.title: Viewer role
oneOf.description: Viewers can read TDs and subscribe to Thing Events

ThingPermissions.title: Thing Permissions
ThingPermissions.description: This defines the roles that have permissions to access this thing
comments: Used by agents and services to set the roles that can invoke actions on a service.
These permissions are default recommendations made by the service provider.
The authz service can override these defaults with another configuration.

thingID.title: Thing ID
thingID.description: ThingID of the service whose permissions are set.
comments: This is the ThingID as send by the agent, without the digitwin prefix.

allow.title: Roles
allow.description: Roles allowed access to a Thing

items.title: Role
items.description: Role allowed access to a Thing

items.title: Role
items.description: Role denied access to the Thing

setPermissions.title: Set Permissions
setPermissions.description: Set the roles that can use a Thing or service
